# bastion_account_piv_policy (Resource)

Manages the PIV (Personal Identity Verification) policy for a Bastion account's ingress keys. This resource manages stable PIV policies. For temporary grace periods, use the `ephemeral:bastion_account_piv_grace` ephemeral resource.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "bastion_account_piv_policy" "example" {
  account = "cal-el"
  policy  = "enforce"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `account` (String) The name of the Bastion account

### Optional

- `policy` (String) The PIV policy for the account. Valid values: `default` (use bastion global policy), `enforce` (only PIV-verified keys allowed, disables non-PIV keys immediately), `never` (never require PIV keys regardless of global setting). Note: The `grace` policy must be managed using the ephemeral resource.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
#!/bin/bash
terraform import bastion_account_piv_policy.example cal-el
```
